attack.title: attack
attack.description:
[color=#ffa050]Accuracy[/color]

[color=#909090]Main Hand[/color]
Your maximum score to [color=#ff8030]hit[/color] the enemy when you attack

Must beat enemy [color=#50ffff]dodge[/color]

Can only attack enemies within [color=#ffff50]range[/color]

     [color=#ffff50]+5%[/color] per point of [color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color] [color=#909090]10% if Two-Handing[/color]

[color=#ffff50]Range[/color] is determined by your Main Hand weapon
attack.name: ATK

damage.title: damage
damage.description:
[color=#ff8030]Hit[/color]

[color=#909090]Main Hand[/color]
The maximum score of damage you [color=#ffff50]deal[/color] when you [color=#ff8030]hit[/color] an enemy with an [color=#ffff50]attack[/color]

     [color=#ffff50]+10%[/color] per point of [color=#ff7050]Strength[/color] [color=#909090]20% if Two-Handing[/color]
damage.name: DMG

attack2.title: attack2
attack2.description:
[color=#ffa050]Accuracy[/color]

[color=#909090]Off Hand[/color]
Your maximum score to [color=#ff8030]hit[/color] the enemy when you attack

Must beat enemy [color=#50ffff]dodge[/color]

Can only attack enemies within [color=#ffff50]range[/color]

     [color=#ffff50]+5%[/color] per point of [color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color] [color=#909090]10% if Two-Handing[/color]

[color=#ffff50]Range[/color] is determined by your Main Hand weapon
attack2.name: ATK

damage2.title: damage2
damage2.description:
[color=#ff8030]Hit[/color]

[color=#909090]Off Hand[/color]
The maximum score of damage you [color=#ffff50]deal[/color] when you [color=#ff8030]hit[/color] an enemy with an [color=#ffff50]attack[/color]

     [color=#ffff50]+10%[/color] per point of [color=#ff7050]Strength[/color] [color=#909090]20% if Two-Handing[/color]
damage2.name: DMG

life.title: life
life.description:
[color=#ff8080]Life[/color]

The absolute measure of your existence. When it reaches 0, [color=#ff3030]you die...[/color]
life.name: HP

revive.title: revive
revive.description:
[color=#ff8080]Life[/color]

The absolute measure of your existence. When it reaches 0, [color=#ff3030]you die...[/color]
revive.description_small:
[center][color=#ff8080]Vigor[/color]
[color=#ff8080]+75 Life[/color]
[color=#a0a0a0][color=#50ff50]heals[/color] you to full life[/color]
[color=#a0a0a0][color=#ffff50]cleanses[/color] you of all harmful effects[/color]
revive.name: Revive

speed.title: speed
speed.description:
[color=#20ff20]Speed[/color]

The speed at which you act

     [color=#ff5050]-1[/color] per point of [color=#ff0000]Encumbrance[/color] above [color=#ff7050]Strength[/color]

     [color=#ff5050]divided[/color] by total [color=#ff0000]Inflexibility[/color] [color=#707070]does not effect bonus Speed[/color]

     [color=#50ff50]cannot be lowered[/color] past minimum [color=#707070]determined by Strength or base (DEX + starting Speed) -- whichever is lower[/color]

Each [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] occurs at Speed 5 [color=#707070]this is the speed at which "on game turn" triggers occur and effects such as Bleed expire[/color]
speed.description_small: The speed at which you act. If enemies are [color=#ffff50]slower[/color] than you, they take [color=#ffff50]less actions[/color]. Each [color=#ffff50]game turn[/color] occurs at speed 10. If your speed is [color=#ffff50]less than a game turn[/color], you act once every turn. If it is [color=#ffff50]greater than a game turn[/color], you may act more often than game turn effects. [color=#ff0000]Penalized by Encumbrance and Inflexibility[/color]
speed.name: SPD

resistances.title: resistances
resistances.description:
[color=#ffff00]Resistances[/color]

The amount of damage you resist of each [color=#ffff50]type[/color]

[color=#ff0000]Negative[/color] resistance causes you to take more damage

Maximum [color=#00ff00]75%[/color], minimum [color=#ff0000]-100%[/color]
resistances.name: RES

dodge.title: dodge
dodge.description:
[color=#50ffff]Dodge[/color]

Your maximum score to dodge an enemy [color=#ffff50]attack[/color]

Must beat enemy [color=#ffa050]accuracy[/color]

If so, the attack is [color=#ffff50]"Dodged"[/color]

     [color=#ffff50]+10[/color] per point of [color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color]
     [color=#ff5050]-10[/color] per point of [color=#ffff50]Encumbrance[/color] above [color=#ff7050]Strength[/color]

[color=#ff5050]10% chance to fail[/color] [color=#707070]permanent[/color]

[color=#ff5050]Does not affect damage[/color] from [color=#ffff50]non-attack sources[/color]
dodge.name: DGE

defense.title: defense
defense.description:
[color=#50ffff]Defense[/color]

Determines your chance to [color=#ffff50]attempt[/color] to [color=#5050ff]Block[/color] an enemy [color=#ffff50]attack[/color]

Must beat enemy [color=#ffa050]accuracy[/color]

Increased by [color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color] and your [color=#ffff50]weapons[/color]
defense.name: DEF

block.title: block
block.description:
[color=#5050ff]Block[/color]

Provides a [color=#ffff50]chance[/color] to reduce [color=#ff8030]damage[/color] dealt by an [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]

If block is equal to or higher than the damage dealt by a [color=#ff8030]hit[/color], the attack is [color=#ffff50]"Blocked"[/color]
     
     [color=#ffff50]+1%[/color] chance per point of [color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color]
     [color=#ffff50]+15%[/color] for each held [color=#ffff50]weapon[/color] and equipped [color=#ffff50]hand armor[/color]
     [color=#c0c0c0]90% maximum[/color]

Amount is determined by your [color=#ffff50]weapons[/color] and the [color=#5050ff]Armor[/color] of your [color=#ffff50]hand armor[/color]

     
     [color=#ffff50]+5[/color] per point of [color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color]
     [color=#ffff50]+5%[/color] per point of [color=#ff7050]Strength[/color]
     [color=#ffff50]+25%[/color] per point of [color=#ff0000]Inflexibility[/color] above 1

[color=#ff5050]Does not affect damage[/color] from [color=#ffff50]non-attack sources[/color]

[color=#ffff50]100%[/color] effective against [color=#af8f50]Physical[/color] damage [color=#a0a0a0]Slash, Blunt and Pierce[/color]

[color=#ffff50]25%[/color] + corresponding [color=#ffff00]Resistance[/color] effective against other kinds of damage
block.name: BLK

armor.title: armor
armor.description:
[color=#5050ff]Armor[/color]

Reduces [color=#ff8030]damage[/color] dealt by an [color=#ff8030]attack[/color]

If armor is equal to or higher than the damage dealt by a [color=#ff8030]hit[/color], the attack is [color=#ffff50]"Shrugged Off"[/color]

     [color=#ffff50]+5[/color] per point of [color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color]
     [color=#ffff50]+2%[/color] per point of [color=#ff7050]Strength[/color]

[color=#ff5050]10% chance to fail[/color] [color=#707070]you will receive a "penetrates your armor" message, a hit received this way will be limited to 90% of your max life[/color]

[color=#ff5050]Does not affect damage[/color] from [color=#ffff50]non-attack sources[/color]

[color=#ffff50]100%[/color] effective against [color=#af8f50]Physical[/color] damage [color=#a0a0a0]Slash, Blunt and Pierce[/color]

[color=#ffff50]25%[/color] + corresponding [color=#ffff00]Resistance[/color] effective against other kinds of damage
armor.name: ARM

inflex.title: inflex
inflex.description:
[color=#ff0000]Inflexibility[/color], if [color=#ffff50]greater than[/color] 1, per point:

     [color=#5050ff]+25% Block[/color]

     [color=#ff5050]Divides[/color] [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color]

     [color=#ff5050]Divides[/color] [color=#c050ff]Willpower damage bonus[/color]
inflex.name: INF

prestige.title: prestige
prestige.description:
[color=#c0c0c0][[color=#ffff50]r[/color]] View prestige classes

You may only have one prestige class, the first you unlock -- it becomes your class name

Unlocked by spending points in various elements and themed powers
prestige.description_small:
[color=#c0c0c0]View prestige classes

You may only have one prestige class, the first you unlock -- it becomes your class name

Unlocked by spending points in various elements and themed powers
prestige.name: prestige

STR.title: STR
STR.description:
[color=#ff7050]Strength[/color], per point:

     [color=#ff8080]+25 Life[/color]

     [color=#5050ff]+5% Block[/color]

     [color=#5050ff]+2% Armor[/color]

     [color=#ff8030]+10% Hit[/color] [color=#c0c0c0]+20% if Two-Handing[/color]

     Negates [color=#ff0000]Encumbrance[/color]
    
     Raises minimum [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color] [color=#707070]up to DEX + starting[/color]
STR.description_small:
[center][color=#ff7050]Strength[/color]
[color=#ff8080]+25 Life[/color]
[color=#5050ff]+5% Block[/color]
[color=#5050ff]+2% Armor[/color]
[color=#ff8030]+10% Hit[/color] [color=#c0c0c0]+20% if Two-Handing[/color]
Negates [color=#ff0000]Encumbrance[/color]
Raises minimum [color=#20ff20]Speed[/color] [color=#707070]up to DEX[/color]
STR.name: STR

DEX.title: DEX
DEX.description:
[color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color], per point:

     [color=#50ffff]+10 Dodge[/color]

     [color=#5050ff]+5 Block[/color]

     [color=#5050ff]+5 Armor[/color]

     [color=#5050ff]+1% chance to Block[/color] [color=#707070] 90% maximum[/color]

     [color=#ffa050]+5% Accuracy[/color] [color=#707070]+10% if Two-Handing[/color]

     [color=#20ff20]+1 Speed[/color]
DEX.description_small:
[center][color=#50ff70]Dexterity[/color]
[color=#50ffff]+10 Dodge[/color]
[color=#5050ff]+5 Block[/color]
[color=#5050ff]+5 Armor[/color]
[color=#5050ff]+1% chance to Block[/color] [color=#707070] 90% maximum[/color]
[color=#ffa050]+5% Accuracy[/color] [color=#707070]+10% if Two-Handing[/color]
[color=#20ff20]+1 Speed[/color]
DEX.name: DEX

WIL.title: WIL
WIL.description:
[color=#c050ff]Willpower[/color], per point:
     
     [color=#ffff50]+10% damage dealt[/color] [color=#707070]divided by Inflexibility[/color]

     [color=#50ff50]+10% healing[/color]

     [color=#ffff50]+1%[/color] chance to recover from each harmful effect [color=#707070]on game turn[/color]
     
     Determines your maximum [color=#8030af]summoned allies[/color]
WIL.description_small:
[center][color=#c050ff]Willpower[/color]
[color=#ffff50]+10% damage dealt[/color] [color=#707070]divided by Inflexibility[/color]
[color=#50ff50]+10% healing[/color]
[color=#ffff50]+1%[/color] chance to recover from each harmful effect [color=#707070]on game turn[/color]
Determines max [color=#8030af]summoned allies[/color]
WIL.name: WIL
